title: Client wont open
body: Every time i open league, it just pops up a bug splat i don't know why and what is causing it i tried running it a lot of times but nothing helps. Any suggestions Riot?

replies.body: Sometimes those bugsplats mean that some of the files for League are damaged or missing. Run through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some quick steps on fixing this up. If that doesn't help go ahead and grab our [**Hextech Repair Tool**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367-Automated-Troubleshooting-Hextech-Repair-Tool) and run it with a **force repatch** to try and fix up those files.
